title: Nicola Roberts goes topless as she shares a VERY bizarre video about her dreams
text:
She recently enjoyed a star-studded birthday night out with the likes of Cheryl and Rochelle Humes.

And Nicola Roberts appeared to be in a reflective mood on Wednesday as she shared a bizarre video about chasing her dreams to Instagram.

In the clip, the former Girls Aloud star, 34, went topless as she just about protected her modesty with two swirling crystals.

Bizarre: Nicola Roberts appeared to be in a reflective mood on Wednesday as she shared a bizarre video about chasing her dreams to Instagram

With relaxing music and birds chirping in the background, Nicola crossed her hands and pretended to hold the two animations.

She captioned the bizarre video: 'Keep your dreams close to your chest.'

Nicola added: 'Someone told me that every time you tell someone what you’re planning or what you want to do or what you’re excited about, their thoughts and energy attach to your dreams.'

Topless: In the clip, the former Girls Aloud star, 34, went topless as she just about protected her modesty with two swirling crystals (pictured in January)

Reflective: With relaxing music and birds chirping in the background, Nicola crossed her hands and pretended to hold the two animations

'And if they think doubts then they drag the dreams down and it’s harder for them to fly,' followed by a butterfly emoji. (sic)

The bizarre video left Nicola's 264K followers equally stunned and inspired as they flocked to the comments section to share their thoughts.

One person said: 'Don't know were to look.'

A different user put: 'This is so true! Sometimes it’s better keeping those dreams to yourself until you reach where you wanted to reach ❤️.'

Stunned: The bizarre video left Nicola's 264K followers equally stunned and inspired as they flocked to the comments section to share their thoughts (pictured over the summer)

Girls Aloud: Nicola's post comes after she enjoyed a birthday night out with her best pals Cheryl and Kimberley Walsh

Another follower commented: 'Beautiful, magical words. Poetry ☄.'

While a different account added: 'Love this! V true in people judging your life choices and such too. Easier to just go out and do you.'

Nicola's post comes after she enjoyed a birthday night out with her best pals Cheryl and Kimberley Walsh.

The singer partied the night away at Ours Restaurant in London on Saturday but her Girls Aloud bandmates Sarah Harding and Nadine Coyle were snubbed from the guestlist.
